title: Replace drag visual in MyTableWidget::mouseMoveEvent
description: Replace text-based drag hack in mytablewidget.cpp (lines 719-726 for playlist, 773-780 for darkSongTable) with QDrag::setDragImage(). Use icons8-music-48.png for single item, add black rectangle badge with count for multiple items.

title: Validate playlist existence in Recent Playlists context menu
Replace drag visual in darkSongTitleLabel
description: Update mouseMoveEvent in songtitlelabel.cpp (around line 112-113) to use setDragImage() with icons8-music-48.png instead of text hack

title: Bug: Dragging from playlist to playlist shows '  '
description: Replace text-based drag visual with document icons. Single song shows document with music note, multiple songs show pile of documents with optional count badge.

title: Add optional count badge for multiple documents
description: For multiple songs being dragged, render a count badge (white number in black rectangle) overlapping the lower right corner of the music icon. Auto-size rectangle to fit count.

title: Add Tags context menu items to palette slots
Replace drag visual in darkPaletteSongTitleLabel
description: Update mouseMoveEvent in songtitlelabel.cpp (around line 197-198) to use setDragImage() with icons8-music-48.png instead of text hack

title: Create document icon resources with music notes
description: Create or source icons: 1) single document with music note, 2) pile of documents with music note. Consider using Qt resources or embedded pixmaps.

title: Add Section Info context menu items to palette slots
